message.content:
cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.CC

Reasoning: 
1. cs.AI - The paper introduces a new problem in team formation and proposes algorithmic heuristics to solve it. This falls under the domain of artificial intelligence and machine learning.
2. cs.DS - The problem of team formation involves data structures and algorithms to efficiently select and partition individuals into teams. This makes it relevant to the data structures and algorithms sub-category.
3. cs.LG - The paper proposes a formulation that allows the team-builder to control the composition of produced teams, which involves learning and optimization techniques. This makes it relevant to the sub-category of machine learning.
4. cs.SI - The paper discusses the practical applications of team formation in educational and organizational settings, which involves social and information systems. This makes it relevant to the sub-category of social and information systems.
5. cs.CC - The paper discusses the complexity of the problem and proves that it is NP-hard to solve and even to approximate. This makes it relevant to the sub-category of computational complexity.
